# iru_in_house_app (Resource)

Manages a Kandji In-House App (.ipa) library item. Note: You must handle the file upload to S3 out-of-band and provide the file_key.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `file_key` (String) The S3 key from the upload endpoint.
- `name` (String) The name for this In-House App.

### Optional

- `active` (Boolean)
- `runs_on_ipad` (Boolean)
- `runs_on_iphone` (Boolean)
- `runs_on_tv` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the In-House App.
